OOC: This one's for Airshadow.

BIC: 

Tucson returns her kisses with some =
of his own, and then holds her gently in his arms.

"What I wouldn't do to =
be able to see you with my own eyes, and finally have my optical sensors re=
paired permanently.  I only got to see you briefly, and what I saw, was mor=
e beautiful than I had first percieved when I first met you.  I want to be =
able to see that beauty again, and always be able to appreciate it.  I prom=
ise you, I will ask Stanton and Bump once they're back on my feet, if it is=
 possible to correct the damgage that was done to my sensors.  I've procras=
tinated long enough, it's time I actually did something about it isn't it?"=
